chart_description: This chart displays the round-trip time of ping requests sent to a specified host. The round-trip time is the amount of time it takes for a ping to go to the host and back to the sender.

dimension_descriptions.avg: The average round-trip time for pings sent to the host.
dimension_descriptions.max: The maximum round-trip time for pings sent to the host.
dimension_descriptions.min: The minimum round-trip time for pings sent to the host.
